attributes.action: Wave nursery fees during Covid19 isolation
attributes.additional_details: Because if a child is not allowed at nursery then the parent cannot work and earn the money to pay for the childcare that is provided.
attributes.background: Cancel all fees for the duration the child is off for.

rejection.details:
The refund of nursery fees for any period of closure is a matter for individual nurseries, not the Government or Parliament.

You could start a petition calling on the Government to set up a fund to reimburse people who have lost money because of the closure of nurseries due to the coronavirus outbreak.

You can find out more about coronavirus and how you can protect yourself and others here:

NHS website: https://www.nhs.uk/conditions/coronavirus-covid-19/
UK Government website: https://www.gov.uk/coronavirus

You can read NHS tips to help if you are worried about coronavirus here: https://www.nhs.uk/oneyou/every-mind-matters/coronavirus-covid-19-anxiety-tips
